desc: Aureate (meaning: golden; pronounced: ore-ee-it) is where people can get their sweet fix, regardless of their dietary choices. The sweet offerings at Aureate are brimming with technical and taste innovations that have a focus on flavour profiles and aesthetic designs that meet Aureate’s quality standards.

layout.text:
Aureate (meaning: golden; pronounced: ore-ee-it)
is where Cantabrians can get their sweet fix,
regardless of their dietary choices.
